relation: buffalo buffalo Private Message Jan 27 2014 at 9:19pm #
Thanks for the free tickets to the International show – awesome. Here are some shots of favorites.
I was gonna take a photo of “I’m with stupid” but it said “no photos” of it! There were personnel standing by every time i walked past. Glad you got one, scofflaw.

^Yeah, after I took the photo, a standing-by-personnel said “no pictures.” I was surprised, I said ” I saw several signs that said “pictures allowed.” He said, “not this painting.” I thought “Oh well, too late. Recorded digitally.”
In general, you are allowed to take pictures in the museum (no flash, though). However, special exhibitions and loaners and other pieces that the museum doesn’t own are out.
I think the highlight for me was running into Mr and Mrs Scott Bricker not 30 seconds after walking in.
After thinking about it, I decided it’s best to remove the image and respect the artist/owner. Gone.
